snippet: In his second revealing interview in two weeks, Pope Francis called the Roman Catholic Church overly clerical and insular, interested in temporal power and often led by “narcissists.”
abstract: Pope Francis, in his second revealing interview in two weeks, calls Roman Catholic Church overly clerical and insular, interested in temporal power and often led by 'narcissists;' presents alternate vision of church as community in service of larger good.
lead_paragraph: In his second revealing interview in two weeks, Pope Francis called the Roman Catholic Church overly clerical and insular, interested in temporal power and often led by “narcissists.”

headline.main: Pope Assails Bureaucracy of Church as Insular
headline.print_headline: Pope Assails Bureaucracy Of Church As Insular
